QuestData.Title: The Root of the Problem
QuestData.Description: Kypari Zar is dying.$B$BA creature of terrible darkness corrupts it from deep beneath its roots.$B$BThe tree cannot be saved, but at least we can lessen its pain.$B$BLook. The vile creature has carved a path to its own lair. We need only follow it down the hill, just behind this tower.
QuestData.CompletionText: The swarm knows not of their terrible folly! These precious trees must be protected at all costs!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, Wakener. Kypari Zar can now dream in peace.$B$BHowever, the beast was merely a vessel for the corruption.$B$BNo... the true corruption lies much deeper.
